T02D2344:2b-1: karma tsanda l'i ka do ha g'i ti n'a ma /
T02D2344:2b-3: las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes bya ba /
T02D2344:2b-4: don thams cad grub pa la phyag 'tshal lo//
T02D2344:3a-0: @3a * // nang nas gtum mo'i me sgar bas //
T02D2344:3a-1: dbus nas bdud rtsi 'bab par byed //
T02D2344:3a-2: rang byung sdong bu skyes pa yis //
T02D2344:3a-3: rtse mo'i ri la phyin te gnas //
T02D2344:3a-4: mgon po'i bdud rtsi 'bab par byed //
T02D2344:3a-5: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom //
T02D2344:3a-7: sangs rgyas yon tan phreng ba 'byung //
T02D2344:3a-8: bde ba chen po rgyas pa yis //
T02D2344:3a-9: thams cad kyis ni khyab par 'gyur //
T02D2344:3a-10: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom //
T02D2344:3a-12: rdo rjes brkos shing bgos pa la //
T02D2344:3a-13: nyi zla gnyis ni bsres byas nas //
T02D2344:3a-14: nam mkha'i dbyings su thim par 'gyur //
T02D2344:3a-15: bde ba chen po'i grong du phyin //
T02D2344:3a-16: kun dbus sangs rgyas yon tan gyis //
T02D2344:3a-17: rin chen 'byung ba'i gnas su brtol //
T02D2344:3a-18: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom //
T02D2344:3a-20: 'byung rgyu'i rlung ni bkag pa yis //
T02D2344:3a-21: rin chen gsal ba'i gnas su phyin //
T02D2344:3a-22: brtags shing brtags shing dpyad pa yis //
T02D2344:3a-24: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yun ring bcom //
T02D2344:3a-26: las kyi gtum mo'i do ha mdzod kyi glu zhes
